english.segment1: Theres a new day dawning now
english.segment2: And a new song singing out. . A river deep and wide. . His love is all around. . His love is all around. . God is all around. . Its a time of jubilee
english.segment3: Young and old set free. . And blind eyes now can see
english.segment4: God is on the move. . God is on the move. . His love is on the move. . It is time to live the life . . For Gods Church to shine for Christ. . Tell the world of love beyond this flesh and blood. . Oh its time to live the life
english.segment5: Ooooh oh, oh oh oooh (repeat). . (So) Open up the windows of Heaven. . Let Your love shine through til the world knows You. Let Your love shine through til the world knows You
